# Modelet e Binjakëve

## Gemini 3 Pro
**Intent:** Introduce and describe the Gemini 3 Pro model, highlighting its key features and capabilities.
**Peek:**
- Model description: "The world’s best model for multimodal understanding...built upon a foundation of state-of-the-art reasoning."
- Provides a button to "Try it in Google AI Studio".
- Model details in a table: code name `gemini-3-pro-preview`, supported data types, token limits, capabilities (audio generation, batch API, memory, code execution, etc.), versions, last updated date, and knowledge cutoff.
- Has another entry for "Gemini 3 Pro Image Preview"
**Pointer:** Middle of the document, after the title.

## Gemini 2.5 Pro
**Intent:** Introduce and describe the Gemini 2.5 Pro model, emphasizing its advanced reasoning capabilities.
**Peek:**
- Model description: "Our state-of-the-art reasoning model, capable of reasoning over complex problems..."
- Provides a button to "Try it in Google AI Studio".
- Model details in a table: code name `gemini-2.5-pro`, supported data types, token limits, capabilities, versions, last updated date, and knowledge cutoff.
- Has another entry for "Gemini 2.5 Pro TTS"
**Pointer:** Middle, after Gemini 3 Pro

## Gemini 2.5 Flash
**Intent:** Introduce the Gemini 2.5 Flash model, focusing on its speed and efficiency.
**Peek:**
- Model description: "Our best price-performance model, delivering versatile capabilities."
- Provides a button to "Try it in Google AI Studio."
- Model details in a table: code name `gemini-2.5-flash`, supported data types, token limits, capabilities, versions, last updated date, and knowledge cutoff.
- Has another entry for "Gemini 2.5 Flash Preview", "Gemini 2.5 Flash Image" and "Gemini 2.5 Flash Live" and "Gemini 2.5 Flash TTS"
**Pointer:** Middle, after Gemini 2.5 Pro

## Gemini 2.5 Flash-Lite
**Intent:** Introduce the Gemini 2.5 Flash-Lite model, highlighting its ultra-fast performance.
**Peek:**
- Model description: "Our fastest flash model optimized for cost efficiency and high throughput."
- Provides a button to "Try it in Google AI Studio".
- Model details in a table: code name `gemini-2.5-flash-lite`, supported data types, token limits, capabilities, versions, last updated date, and knowledge cutoff.
- Has another entry for "Gemini 2.5 Flash-Lite Preview"
**Pointer:** Middle, after Gemini 2.5 Flash

## Previous Gemini Models
**Intent:** Introduce older models of Gemini
**Peek:**
- Details the "Gemini 2.0 Flash" model
- Details the "Gemini 2.0 Flash-Lite" model
**Pointer:** Middle, after Gemini 2.5 Flash Lite

## Model Version Naming Conventions
**Intent:** Explain the different versioning schemes for Gemini models (Stable, Preview, Latest, Experimental).
**Peek:**
- **Stable:** `gemini-2.5-flash`
- **Preview:** `gemini-2.5-flash-preview-09-2025`
- **Latest:** `gemini-flash-latest`
- **Experimental:** (Description, no code example)
**Pointer:** End of document

## Model Deprecations
**Intent:** To advise the user to read the deprecations page.
**Peek:**
- A link to the deprecations page.
**Pointer:** End of the document.
